```{r}
library(rvest)
library(polite)

url1<- "https://www.amazon.com/Brother-Monochrome-MFCL5700DW-MFCL5705DW-Additional/dp/B0C6CQQPVC/ref=sr_1_1_sspa?qid=1707351310&s=computers-intl-ship&sr=1-1-spons&sp_csd=d2lkZ2V0TmFtZT1zcF9hdGZfYnJvd3Nl&th=1"

session <- bow(url1, 
               user_agent = "Educational purposes")
session

session_page <- scrape(session)

```
```{r}
printer_url1 <- read_html(url1)

#scrape for the name of the product
printername1 <- printer_url1 %>%
  html_nodes("h1.a-size-large.a-spacing-none") %>%
  html_text
printername1

#scrape the price
printerprice1 <- printer_url1 %>%
  html_nodes("span.a-price.aok-align-center.reinventPricePriceToPayMargin") %>%
  html_text()
printerprice1

#Scrape the ratings
printerratings1 <- printer_url1 %>%
  html_nodes("i.a-icon.a-icon-star.a-star-4.cm-cr-review-stars-spacing-big") %>%
  html_text()
printerratings1

#scrape the total reviews
printertotalrev1 <- printer_url1 %>%
  html_nodes("span#acrCustomerReviewText.a-size-base") %>%
  html_text()
printertotalrev1

#merge it in a data frame
data_Frame1 <- data.frame(
  Product_Name = printername1,
  Price = printerprice1,
  Ratings = printerratings1,
  Reviews = printertotalrev1
)
data_Frame1
```

```{r}
library(rvest)
library(polite)

url2<- "https://www.amazon.com/Canon-TR4723-Wireless-Inkjet-Printer/dp/B0CQLQ6S7T/ref=sr_1_2_sspa?qid=1707356088&s=computers-intl-ship&sr=1-2-spons&sp_csd=d2lkZ2V0TmFtZT1zcF9hdGZfYnJvd3Nl&th=1"

printer_url2 <- read_html(url2)

#scrape for the name of the product
printername2 <- printer_url2 %>%
  html_nodes("h1.a-size-large.a-spacing-none") %>%
  html_text
printername2

#scrape the price
printerprice2 <- printer_url2 %>%
  html_nodes("span.a-price.aok-align-center.reinventPricePriceToPayMargin.priceToPay") %>%
  html_text()
printerprice2

#Scrape the ratings
printerratings2 <- printer_url2 %>%
  html_nodes("i.a-icon.a-icon-star.a-star-4.cm-cr-review-stars-spacing-big") %>%
  html_text()
printerratings2

#scrape the total reviews
printertotalrev2 <- printer_url2 %>%
  html_nodes("span#acrCustomerReviewText.a-size-base") %>%
  html_text()
printertotalrev2

#merge it in a data frame

data_Frame2 <- data.frame(
  ProductName = printername2,
  Price = printerprice2,
  Ratings = printerratings2,
  Reviews = printertotalrev2
  
)
data_Frame2
```
